description.tr: Kimberly Clark, 1872 yılında John A. Kimberly, Havilah Babcock, Charles B. Clark ve Franklyn C. Shattuck tarafından kurulan Kimberly-Clark Corporation bünyesindeki kağıt tabanlı tüketici ürünleri üreten çokuluslu kişisel bakım şirketidir.Kimberly-Clark Corporation 37 ülkede üretim yapmaktadır ve 150 ülkede satış ağı bulunmaktadır. Türkiye pazarına ise 2005 yılında giriş yapmıştır.Kimberly-Clark Corporation Amerika merkezlidir.Kimberly-Clark Corporation bünyesindeki markalar:CottonelleDependGoodNitesHuggiesHuggies DrynitesHuggies Little SwimmersJackson SafetyKimcareKimtechKimWipesKleenBebeKleenexKLEENGUARDKotexNapkinPoisePull-UpsScottVIVAWypall
description.en: Kimberly-Clark is a multinational personal care company that produces paper-based consumer products within the Kimberly-Clark Corporation, founded in 1872 by John A. Kimberly, Havilah Babcock, Charles B. Clark, and Franklyn C. Shattuck. Kimberly-Clark Corporation manufactures in 37 countries and has a sales network in 150 countries. It entered the Turkish market in 2005. Kimberly-Clark Corporation is headquartered in America. Brands within Kimberly-Clark Corporation include: Cottonelle, Depend, GoodNites, Huggies, Huggies Drynites, Huggies Little Swimmers, Jackson Safety, Kimcare, Kimtech, KimWipes, KleenBebe, Kleenex, KLEENGUARD, Kotex, Napkin, Poise, Pull-Ups, Scott, VIVA, Wypall.
description.de: Kimberly-Clark ist ein multinationales Unternehmen für Körperpflegeprodukte, das papierbasierte Konsumgüter herstellt und Teil der Kimberly-Clark Corporation ist, die 1872 von John A. Kimberly, Havilah Babcock, Charles B. Clark und Franklyn C. Shattuck gegründet wurde. Die Kimberly-Clark Corporation produziert in 37 Ländern und verfügt über ein Vertriebsnetz in 150 Ländern. In den türkischen Markt trat das Unternehmen im Jahr 2005 ein. Die Kimberly-Clark Corporation hat ihren Hauptsitz in Amerika. Zu den Marken der Kimberly-Clark Corporation gehören: Cottonelle, Depend, GoodNites, Huggies, Huggies Drynites, Huggies Little Swimmers, Jackson Safety, Kimcare, Kimtech, KimWipes, KleenBebe, Kleenex, KLEENGUARD, Kotex, Napkin, Poise, Pull-Ups, Scott, VIVA, Wypall.

description.tr: Mars Snickers1911 yılında Franklin Clarence Mars tarafından kurulan Mars Incorporated bünyesinde üretilen yer fıstıklı karamel ve helva kaplı sütlü çikolata markasıdır.Aşırı şekerli, nişasta bazlı tatlandırıcılı, palm yağı, laktoz, soya içermektedir.Mars Ailesine ait olan Mars Incorporated Amerika merkezlidir. description.en: Snickers is a milk chocolate bar with peanut caramel and nougat, manufactured by Mars, Incorporated, which was founded by Franklin Clarence Mars in 1911. It contains excessive sugar, starch-based sweeteners, palm oil, lactose, and soy. Mars, Incorporated, a company owned by the Mars family, is headquartered in the United States. It has production facilities in countries such as the United States, the United Kingdom, Germany, Hungary, and Australia. Its brands include: 3 Musketeers, Abu Siouf, American Muzza, Amicelli, Applause, Aquarian, Balisto, Banjo, Bisc (&), Biscrok, Blossom, Bounty, Brekkies, Calapuno, Canyon, Catsan, Celebrations, Cesar, Chappi, Chappie, Chocolate Minstrels, Chum, Cleo, Cocoavia, Combos, Converted, Crunch!, Darb Labena, Dentabits, Dentarask, Dentastix, Denture Your Dog, Doggie Dentures, Dolmio, Don’t Stop, Dove, Dream, Dreamies, Evo, Exelpet, Fanfare, Flutes, Follow Your Passıon, Frolic, Fun Size, Galaxy, Galaxy Dove, Galaxy Jewels, Galaxy Minstrels, Galaxy Moments, Galaxy Ripple, Galaxy Senzi, Galaxy Stix, Get Some Nuts, Golden Grains, Gravybones, Greenies, Groom Of The Table, Halls, Jawza, Jewels, Jms, Jolina, Jumbone, Junglies, Kal Kan, Katkins, Kitbits, Kitekat, Kit-E-Kat, Kitekat With Beef In Gravy, Kitstrips, Long Live Cats, Love Them Back, Loyal, M & M’s, M & M’s Peanut, M &Cm’s Milk Chocolate, M&M Milk Chocolate, M&M’s Choco, M&M’s Peanut, M&M’s Dayanilmaz Çikolata, Majarra, Maltesers, Marathon, Marino, Markies, Mars, Marsettes, Master Foods, Masterfoods, Masterfoodservices, Merrikh, Milk Chocolate M&Ms, Milky Way, Milkyway 2, Minstrels, Moments, Mondo, Natusan, Nutrivit, Nutro Choice, Oh So…, Opal Fruits, Optima, Osstop, Pal, Partners, Pause More. description.de: Snickers ist eine Marke für Milchschokolade mit Erdnüssen, Karamell und Nougat, die von Mars Incorporated hergestellt wird. Mars Incorporated wurde 1911 von Franklin Clarence Mars gegründet. Sie enthält übermäßig viel Zucker, Süßungsmittel auf Stärkebasis, Palmöl, Laktose und Soja. Mars Incorporated, ein Unternehmen im Besitz der Familie Mars, hat seinen Hauptsitz in Amerika (McLean, Virginia). Es verfügt über Produktionsstätten in Ländern wie den USA, Großbritannien, Deutschland, Ungarn und Australien. Marken des Unternehmens sind: 3 Musketeers, Abu Siouf, American Muzza, Amicelli, Applause, Aquarian, Balisto, Banjo, Bisc (&), Biscrok, Blossom, Bounty, Brekkies, Calapuno, Canyon, Catsan, Celebrations, Cesar, Chappi, Chappie, Chocolate Minstrels, Chum, Cleo, Cocoavia, Combos, Converted, Crunch!, Darb Labena, Dentabits, Dentarask, Dentastix, Denture Your Dog, Doggie Dentures, Dolmio, Don’t Stop, Dove, Dream, Dreamies, Evo, Exelpet, Fanfare, Flutes, Follow Your Passıon, Frolic, Fun Size, Galaxy, Galaxy Dove, Galaxy Jewels, Galaxy Minstrels, Galaxy Moments, Galaxy Ripple, Galaxy Senzi, Galaxy Stix, Get Some Nuts, Golden Grains, Gravybones, Greenies, Groom Of The Table, Halls, Jawza, Jewels, Jms, Jolina, Jumbone, Junglies, Kal Kan, Katkins, Kitbits, Kitekat, Kit-E-Kat, Kitekat With Beef In Gravy, Kitstrips, Long Live Cats, Love Them Back, Loyal, M & M’s, M & M’s Peanut, M &Cm’s Milk Chocolate, M&M Milk Chocolate, M&M’s Choco, M&M’s Peanut, M&M’s Dayanilmaz Çikolata, Majarra, Maltesers, Marathon, Marino, Markies, Mars, Marsettes, Master Foods, Masterfoods, Masterfoodservices, Merrikh, Milk Chocolate M&Ms, Milky Way, Milkyway 2, Minstrels, Moments, Mondo, Natusan, Nutrivit, Nutro Choice, Oh So…, Opal Fruits, Optima, Osstop, Pal, Partners, Pause More. description.en: Hershey's is a chocolate and confectionery brand produced by The Hershey Company, which was founded in 1894. The Hershey Company is headquartered in America. Shareholders: Brands under its umbrella: Awesome Twosome, Hereheis, Heresheis, Heresheis, Hershey’s, Hersheys Hugs, Hersheys Kisses, High Life, Hugs, Lancaster, Natural Source Of Flavanol Antioxidants, Nutrageous, Reeses, Twizzlers
description.de: Hershey's ist eine Schokoladen- und Süßwarenmarke, die unter der 1894 gegründeten The Hershey Company hergestellt wird. Die Hershey Company hat ihren Hauptsitz in Amerika. Marken unter dem Dach: Awesome Twosome, Hereheis, Heresheis, Hershey’s, Hersheys Hugs, Hersheys Kisses, High Life, Hugs, Lancaster, Natural Source Of Flavanol Antioxidants, Nutrageous, Reeses, Twizzlers

description.en: Tom Ford is a ready-to-wear, leather accessories, footwear, cosmetics, and fragrance brand under Tom Ford SA, which was founded by Tom Ford in 2005. Tom Ford SA was acquired by the American-based The Estee Lauder Companies Inc. in 2023.
description.de: Tom Ford ist eine Marke für Konfektionskleidung, Lederaccessoires, Schuhe, Kosmetika und Düfte unter dem Dach der Tom Ford SA, die 2005 von Tom Ford gegründet wurde. Die Tom Ford SA wurde 2023 von der amerikanischen The Estee Lauder Companies Inc. übernommen.
